tr_quotes.quote: Düşünce söz olarak açığa çıkar. Söz eylem olarak ortaya çıkar. Eylem alışkanlığa dönüşür. Alışkanlık karakter haline gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimin kökleri acı meyveleri tatlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Aristoteles

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim öğrencilere saygıyla başlar.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimin ilk ve en iyi merkezi evdir.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim kabiliyetleri olgunlaştım ama vücuda getiremez.
tr_quotes.author: Voltaire

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan eğitimle doğmaz ama eğitimle yaşar.
tr_quotes.author: Cervantes

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim refah anında bir süs felaket sırasında bir sığınaktır
tr_quotes.author: Aristoteles

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan eğitilmesi zorunlu olan tek yaratıktır.
tr_quotes.author: lmmanuel Kant

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimli insanlar yapabileceklerinden fazlasını söylemeye utanırlar.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyus

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim kafayı geliştirmek demektir belleği doldurmak değil.
tr_quotes.author: Mark Twain

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimin asıl büyük amacı bilgilenmek değil eyleme geçmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

tr_quotes.quote: Terbiyenin gayesi insanlarda bulunan kabiliyetleri geliştirmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Eflatun

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim ekmek ve sudan sonra halkın en zorunlu ihtiyacıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

tr_quotes.quote: Öğretim sınıfta biter fakat eğitim ancak hayatla beraber sona erer.
tr_quotes.author: F. W. Robertson

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim sınırlarından dışarıya çıkan bir daha içeri giremez.
tr_quotes.author: Nicolas Boileau

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimin insanı bozmaması yetmez daha iyiden yana değiştirmesi gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Montaigne

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim kıvılcımla ateş yakmaktır. Boş bir kabı doldurmak değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Sokrates

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimin amacı doğuştan insanda var olan cevheri işlemek özü geliştirmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Galiani

tr_quotes.quote: Bir şeyi bilmek nasıl beceriyse onu öğretebilmek de beceridir.
tr_quotes.author: Cicero

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimin temel amacı çocukları kendi yeteneklerinin bilincine vardırmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim okulun eseri değil insanın kendinde mevcut faziletlernin eseridir.
tr_quotes.author: Louis Bromfield

tr_quotes.quote: Terbiye piyano eğitimine benzer genç yaşta alışılmazsa asla öğretilemez
tr_quotes.author: La Gou

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim bir insanın dikdatör olmasına değil önder olmasına yarar.
tr_quotes.author: Lord Braugham

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim görmüş bir kimsede ilk göze çarpan şey kafasının metodlu çalışmasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Calvin Coleridge

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim ferdin yaşama sanatını idrak edebilmesi için rehber olmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: A. North Whitehead

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan için en güzel terbiye insanın kendi kendine verdiği terbiyedir.
tr_quotes.author: Walter Scott

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimden yoksun olan insanlar ölünceye kadar şahsiyetsiz kalmaya mahkumdurlar.
tr_quotes.author: Ziya Gökalp

tr_quotes.quote: Bir ülkenin geleceği o ülke insanlarının göreceği eğitime bağlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan sevmediği bir kimseden öğrenemez.
tr_quotes.author: Aristo

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimin kökleri acıdır, meyvesi tatlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Aristo

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimin en yüksek sonucu, hoşgörüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Helen Keller

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimin ilk ve en iyi merkezi evdir.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan eğitimle doğmaz ama eğitimle yaşar.
tr_quotes.author: Cervantes

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimin kökleri acı, meyveleri tatlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Aristoteles

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim öğrencilere saygıyla başlar.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim karanlıktan aydınlığa olan harekettir.
tr_quotes.author: Allan Bloom

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek eğitim, kendinden en iyiyi vermekten geçer.
tr_quotes.author: Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim, geleceğimizi kurduğumuz temeldir.
tr_quotes.author: Christine Gregoire

tr_quotes.quote: Yurt müdafaasının en emin ve en ucuz yolu, eğitimdir.
tr_quotes.author: Büchner

tr_quotes.quote: En çok hürriyet nerede ise, en çok eğitim oradadır.
tr_quotes.author: M.Audemars

tr_quotes.quote: Ekmekten sonra eğitim, bir milletin en büyük ihtiyacıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Lord Byron

tr_quotes.quote: En büyük savaş, cahilliğe karşı yapılan savaştır.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim, özgürlüğün altın kapısını açan anahtardır.
tr_quotes.author: George Washington Carver

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim kıvılcımla ateş yakmaktır. Boş bir kabı doldurmak değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Sokrates

tr_quotes.quote: Bir ulusu yönetmek, dört çocuğu eğitmekten daha kolaydır.
tr_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim, okulda öğrendiklerini unuttuktan sonra kalan şeydir.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim yaşam için hazırlık değildir; eğitim hayatın ta kendisidir.
tr_quotes.author: John Dewey

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimli insanlar yapabileceklerinden fazlasını söylemeye utanırlar.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyus

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim karanlıktan aydınlığa olan harekettir.
tr_quotes.author: Allan Bloom

tr_quotes.quote: Bir mermer parçası için heykeltraş ne ise, ruh için de eğitim odur.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Edison

tr_quotes.quote: Eserinin üzerinde imzası olmayan yegane sanatkar öğretmendir.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Bir kişiye iyilik yapmak istiyorsan ona balık verme, balık tutmayı öğret.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyüs

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim, kültür ve bilgi aydınlığa açılan en geniş penceredir.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Bir ülkenin geleceği, o ülke insanlarının göreceği eğitime bağlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimin pahalı olduğunu düşünüyorsanız, bir de cehaletin bedelini hesaplayın.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimin amacı, doğuştan insanda var olan cevheri işlemek, özü geliştirmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Galiani

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimin temel amacı, çocukları kendi yeteneklerinin bilincine vardırmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim, ferdin yaşama sanatını idrak edebilmesi için, rehber olmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: A. North Whitehead

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim, gerçeklerin öğretilmesi değildir. Düşünmek için aklın eğitilmesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenmek, akıntıya karşı yüzmek gibidir, ilerleyemediğiniz taktirde gerilersiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Çin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Bilginin gücüne inanıyorum kültürün gücüne inanıyorum ama eğitimin gücüne daha çok inanıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsana hiçbir şey öğretemezsin; öğrenmeyi ancak kendi içinde bulacağını öğretebilirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Galileo

tr_quotes.quote: Birini eğitmenin asıl amacı, onu sürekli sorular soran biri haline getirmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Bishop Creighton

tr_quotes.quote: Kızlarını okutmayan millet, oğullarını öksüzlüğe uğratmış demektir, hüsranına ağlasın.
tr_quotes.author: Tevfik Fikret

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim ana dizinden başlar; her söylenilen kelime çocuğun kişiliğine konan bir tuğladır.
tr_quotes.author: Hosea Bacon

tr_quotes.quote: Planınız bir yıl içinse pirinç ekin, on yıl içinse ağaç dikin, yüzyıl içinse, insanları eğitin.
tr_quotes.author: Huang-Çe

tr_quotes.quote: Rahatlığın sona erip sıkıntının başladığı yerde, yaşamın bize vermeyi amaçladığı eğitim başlar.
tr_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

tr_quotes.quote: Bilginin gücüne inanıyorum, kültürün gücüne inanıyorum; ama eğitimin gücüne, daha çok inanıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Seyyid Kutub

tr_quotes.quote: İzin verin, çocuğunuz yaşamını tribünlerde seyirci olarak değil, sahada oyuncu olarak geçirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Doğan Cüceloğlu

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim sisteminin belli bir düzene göre işlemesine karşılık, yaşam okulu düzensiz ve karışıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim görmüş halkı bir yöne sevk etmek kolay, sürüklemek güçtür; idare etmek kolay, köleleştirmek imkânsızdır.
tr_quotes.author: Montaigne

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim hayattaki başarının anahtarıdır ve öğretmenler öğrencilerin yaşamlarında kalıcı bir etki bırakmaktadır.
tr_quotes.author: Solomon Ortiz

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenmeyi bırakan kişi yirmisinde de olsa, sekseninde de olsa yaşlıdır. Yaşamdaki en muhteşem şey zihni genç tutmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Ford

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitimdir ki bir milleti ya hür, bağımsız, şanlı, yüksek bir topluluk halinde yaşatır; ya da esaret ve sefalete terk eder.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim sadece okula gitmek ve bir derece kazanmakla ilgili değildir. Bilginizi genişletmek ve yaşam hakkındaki gerçeği almakla ilgilidir.
tr_quotes.author: Shakuntala Devi

tr_quotes.quote: Eğitim insanın güç sandığı ya da gerçekten kolay alt edilebilen engelleri nasıl aşacağını öğretme sanatından başka bir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow
en_quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

en_quotes.quote: If history repeats itself, and the unexpected always happens, how incapable must Man be of learning from experience
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: I made decisions that I regret, and I took them as learning experiences... I'm human, not perfect, like anybody else
en_quotes.author: Queen Latifah

en_quotes.quote: Do your best and keep learning - that's what I believe in
en_quotes.author: Suriya

en_quotes.quote: He who learns but does not think, is lost! He who thinks but does not learn is in great danger
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: A single conversation across the table with a wise man is better than ten years mere study of books
en_quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

en_quotes.quote: You're never too old to start learning, and you're never too young to aim high and achieve great things
en_quotes.author: Asa Hutchinson

en_quotes.quote: I'm learning to deal with my loneliness because then nobody can muck me around any more
en_quotes.author: Amanda Eliasch

en_quotes.quote: God lets everything happen for a reason. It's all a learning process, and you have to go from one level to another
en_quotes.author: Mike Tyson

en_quotes.quote: A man only learns in two ways, one by reading, and the other by association with smarter people
en_quotes.author: Will Rogers

en_quotes.quote: The library is the temple of learning, and learning has liberated more people than all the wars in history
en_quotes.author: Carl T. Rowan

en_quotes.quote: Seeing much, suffering much, and studying much, are the three pillars of learning
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: I learned long ago, never to wrestle with a pig. You get dirty, and besides, the pig likes it
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Research is formalized curiosity. It is poking and prying with a purpose
en_quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

en_quotes.quote: A good teacher must be able to put himself in the place of those who find learning hard
en_quotes.author: Eliphas Levi

en_quotes.quote: Change is the end result of all true learning
en_quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

en_quotes.quote: Waiting is a period of learning. The longer we wait, the more we hear about him for whom we are waiting
en_quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

en_quotes.quote: Research is creating new knowledge
en_quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

en_quotes.quote: Art in the classroom not only spurs creativity, it also inspires learning
en_quotes.author: Mickey Hart

en_quotes.quote: A weed is a plant that has mastered every survival skill except for learning how to grow in rows
en_quotes.author: Doug Larson

en_quotes.quote: A happy life is one spent in learning, earning, and yearning
en_quotes.author: Lillian Gish

en_quotes.quote: Curiosity is the wick in the candle of learning
en_quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

en_quotes.quote: You cannot open a book without learning something
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: A University should be a place of light, of liberty, and of learning
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: Poverty must not be a bar to learning and learning must offer an escape from poverty
en_quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Much learning does not teach understanding
en_quotes.author: Heraclitus

en_quotes.quote: Life isn't about algebra and geometry. Learning by making mistakes and not duplicating them is what life is about
en_quotes.author: Lindsay Fox

en_quotes.quote: Prepare for the unknown by studying how others in the past have coped with the unforeseeable and the unpredictable
en_quotes.author: George S. Patton

en_quotes.quote: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship
en_quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

en_quotes.quote: I'd rather learn from one bird how to sing than teach ten thousand stars how not to dance
en_quotes.author: e. e. cummings

en_quotes.quote: Learning is the new skill. Imagination, creation and asking new questions are at its core
en_quotes.author: Sugata Mitra

en_quotes.quote: The learning and knowledge that we have, is, at the most, but little compared with that of which we are ignorant
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: I feel I have learnt a lot on the sets of 'Beyond The Clouds,' and it will be a life-long learning for me
en_quotes.author: Ishaan Khatter

en_quotes.quote: Every student has something to offer, and every student deserves a nurturing learning environment
en_quotes.author: Ilhan Omar

en_quotes.quote: We come to love not by finding a perfect person but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly
en_quotes.author: Sam Keen

en_quotes.quote: There's no shortcut to learning a craft; you just have to put the years in
en_quotes.author: Kylie Minogue

en_quotes.quote: The laptop brings back a more seamless kind of learning
en_quotes.author: Nicholas Negroponte

en_quotes.quote: The hardest job kids face today is learning good manners without seeing any
en_quotes.author: Fred Astaire

en_quotes.quote: Learning without thought is labor lost; thought without learning is perilous
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: We must learn to live together as brothers or perish together as fools
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: As an entrepreneur, you never stop learning
en_quotes.author: Daymond John

en_quotes.quote: The love of learning, the sequestered nooks, And all the sweet serenity of books
en_quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

en_quotes.quote: As long as you live, keep learning how to live
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: I always say the minute I stop making mistakes is the minute I stop learning and I've definitely learned a lot
en_quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

en_quotes.quote: Dont give up. Obstacles can be overcome through strategy and learning
en_quotes.author: Hidetaka Miyazaki

en_quotes.quote: Flying is learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss
en_quotes.author: Douglas Adams

en_quotes.quote: You cannot go wrong by learning classical music because it trains the ear
en_quotes.author: Kiesza

en_quotes.quote: Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer
en_quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: The noblest pleasure is the joy of understanding
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: Every successful business professional I know is constantly learning, reading, growing in their field
en_quotes.author: Rachel Hollis

en_quotes.quote: Every immigrant who comes here should be required within five years to learn English or leave the country
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: A little learning, indeed, may be a dangerous thing, but the want of learning is a calamity to any people
en_quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

en_quotes.quote: Every outing is a learning experience
en_quotes.author: Drew Pomeranz

en_quotes.quote: A little learning is a dangerous thing; Drink deep, or taste not the Pierian spring
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: By playing games you can artificially speed up your learning curve to develop the right kind of thought processes
en_quotes.author: Nate Silver

en_quotes.quote: A child's learning is a function more of the characteristics of his classmates than those of the teacher
en_quotes.author: James S. Coleman

en_quotes.quote: Neither comprehension nor learning can take place in an atmosphere of anxiety
en_quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: I'm a very strong believer in listening and learning from others
en_quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

en_quotes.quote: Learning how to learn is life's most important skill
en_quotes.author: Tony Buzan

en_quotes.quote: As I enter a new phase of life and my circle broadens, I start learning new things
en_quotes.author: Kapil Dev

en_quotes.quote: The individualization of learning fundamentally redefines the role of assessment
en_quotes.author: Sebastian Thrun

en_quotes.quote: You never stop learning. If you have a teacher, you never stop being a student
en_quotes.author: Elisabeth Rohm

en_quotes.quote: The minute that you're not learning I believe you're dead
en_quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

en_quotes.quote: Love your family. Love your country. Never stop learning... And always look back and be grateful to where you came from
en_quotes.author: John Gokongwei

en_quotes.quote: I spend a lot of time learning about bird watching
en_quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

en_quotes.quote: The ultimate lesson all of us have to learn is unconditional love, which includes not only others but ourselves as well
en_quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

en_quotes.quote: I am learning all the time. The tombstone will be my diploma
en_quotes.author: Eartha Kitt

en_quotes.quote: Learning to play with a big amplifier is like trying to control an elephant
en_quotes.author: Ritchie Blackmore

en_quotes.quote: Learning to live with the given is the great humbling educational process of life
en_quotes.author: David Milch

en_quotes.quote: I think one of the great things about being a musician is that you never stop learning
en_quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

en_quotes.quote: Going to a party, for me, is as much a learning experience as, you know, sitting in a lecture
en_quotes.author: Natalie Portman

en_quotes.quote: For me, I like to push myself... I hate feeling complacent or that I'm not learning
en_quotes.author: Derek Hough

en_quotes.quote: Education is learning what you didn't even know you didn't know
en_quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

en_quotes.quote: There are three ingredients in the good life: learning, earning and yearning
en_quotes.author: Christopher Morley

en_quotes.quote: Life is like playing a violin solo in public and learning the instrument as one goes on
en_quotes.author: Samuel Butler

en_quotes.quote: To know oneself is to study oneself in action with another person
en_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

en_quotes.quote: The only thing that interferes with my learning is my education
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: The best thing we can do with rejection is to make it a learning experience - rejection is a great teacher
en_quotes.author: Adena Friedman

en_quotes.quote: No good actor ever stops learning. He is constantly evolving
en_quotes.author: Mahesh Babu

en_quotes.quote: It is only when we forget all our learning that we begin to know
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: A camera is a tool for learning how to see without a camera
en_quotes.author: Dorothea Lange

en_quotes.quote: The highest activity a human being can attain is learning for understanding, because to understand is to be free
en_quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

en_quotes.quote: Learning networking basics is only a gateway to career growth and exploration
en_quotes.author: Tae Yoo

en_quotes.quote: Why waste time learning, when ignorance is instantaneous?
en_quotes.author: Bill Watterson

en_quotes.quote: The life ahead can only be glorious if you learn to live in total harmony with the Lord
en_quotes.author: Sai Baba

en_quotes.quote: I try to learn from the past, but I plan for the future by focusing exclusively on the present. That's where the fun is
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: As long as I'm learning something, I figure I'm OK - it's a decent day
en_quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

en_quotes.quote: I am still learning
en_quotes.author: Michelangelo

en_quotes.quote: The only things worth learning are the things you learn after you know it all
en_quotes.author: Harry S Truman

en_quotes.quote: There's no way I can justify my salary level, but I'm learning to live with it
en_quotes.author: Drew Carey

en_quotes.quote: We do not learn; and what we call learning is only a process of recollection
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: I remember learning as a kid that love meant loneliness and confusion
en_quotes.author: Calum Scott

en_quotes.quote: Learning is pleasurable but doing is the height of enjoyment
en_quotes.author: Novalis

en_quotes.quote: Never become so much of an expert that you stop gaining expertise. View life as a continuous learning experience
en_quotes.author: Denis Waitley

en_quotes.quote: I'm learning the power of going away for the weekend and keeping myself company
en_quotes.author: Zoe Saldana

en_quotes.quote: Everything I learned I learned from the movies
en_quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

en_quotes.quote: Question everything. Learn something. Answer nothing
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: I'm always interested in learning something new
en_quotes.author: Katherine Johnson

en_quotes.quote: My choice of learning pharmacy was driven by my interests, curiosity, and a desire to seek new medicines for patients
en_quotes.author: Tu Youyou

en_quotes.quote: Strange as it may seem, no amount of learning can cure stupidity, and formal education positively fortifies it
en_quotes.author: Stephen Vizinczey

en_quotes.quote: I never learned from a man who agreed with me
en_quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

en_quotes.quote: Learning is the gateway to adventure
en_quotes.author: Princess Beatrice of York

en_quotes.quote: Doing a documentary is about discovering, being open, learning, and following curiosity
en_quotes.author: Spike Jonze

en_quotes.quote: I'm passionate about learning. I'm passionate about life
en_quotes.author: Tom Cruise

en_quotes.quote: Every day, I'm learning new things about myself. Every day, I'm learning new things about life
en_quotes.author: Aquaria

en_quotes.quote: When you win a lot, you don't learn much. With my ups and downs, it's a lot of learning
en_quotes.author: Tina Maze

en_quotes.quote: Just learning to think in another language allows you to see your own culture in a better viewpoint
en_quotes.author: Gates McFadden

en_quotes.quote: Scholastic learning and polemical divinity retarded the growth of all true knowledge
en_quotes.author: David Hume

en_quotes.quote: Experience is making mistakes and learning from them
en_quotes.author: Bill Ackman

en_quotes.quote: For me, I try to live life every day by getting to know people for who they are and learning from them
en_quotes.author: Abby Huntsman

en_quotes.quote: Justice turns the scale, bringing to some learning through suffering
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: I would try to run when I was barely learning how to walk, so I would just fall
en_quotes.author: Cuco

en_quotes.quote: Recipes tell you nothing. Learning techniques is the key
en_quotes.author: Tom Colicchio

en_quotes.quote: The process of learning requires not only hearing and applying but also forgetting and then remembering again
en_quotes.author: John Gray

en_quotes.quote: Learning to ride a bike in a public park means anyone can see you
en_quotes.author: Mary H.K. Choi

en_quotes.quote: A humble knowledge of thyself is a surer way to God than a deep search after learning
en_quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

en_quotes.quote: The soul is everlasting, and its learning experience is lifetime after lifetime
en_quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

en_quotes.quote: The challenge as a parent is letting your kids fail in the right ways because that's where we do most of our learning
en_quotes.author: Rob Lowe

en_quotes.quote: I think the most wonderful thing in the world is another chef. I'm always excited about learning new things about food
en_quotes.author: Paul Prudhomme

en_quotes.quote: I've taken a tenacious bulldog approach to learning new skills throughout my life
en_quotes.author: Apollo Robbins

en_quotes.quote: I thought of learning cinematography, so I assisted a cinematographer for an ad
en_quotes.author: Fatima Sana Shaikh

en_quotes.quote: I'm always learning new things about myself
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Van Ness

en_quotes.quote: My rookie year was huge for me as far as the learning curve, especially those last three games
en_quotes.author: Tim Tebow

en_quotes.quote: Learning too soon our limitations, we never learn our powers
en_quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

en_quotes.quote: What matters to me is learning and growing, and getting to do what I love to do. As long as I can do that, I'm happy
en_quotes.author: Jeremy Renner

en_quotes.quote: Learning by doing, peer-to-peer teaching, and computer simulation are all part of the same equation
en_quotes.author: Nicholas Negroponte

en_quotes.quote: The first problem for all of us, men and women, is not to learn, but to unlearn
en_quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

en_quotes.quote: Words are but wind; and learning is nothing but words; ergo, learning is nothing but wind
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

en_quotes.quote: Success in management requires learning as fast as the world is changing
en_quotes.author: Warren Bennis

en_quotes.quote: I like to start out each day from the beginning. I'm always learning things
en_quotes.author: Bruce Weber

en_quotes.quote: I learnt not to be desperate in bad times and am learning not to be bullish when times are good
en_quotes.author: John Elkann

en_quotes.quote: Making a wrong decision is understandable. Refusing to search continually for learning is not
en_quotes.author: Phil Crosby

en_quotes.quote: I want to keep learning, keep exploring, keep doing more
en_quotes.author: Jessye Norman

en_quotes.quote: I'm learning to work under pressure. Yesteryear songs are slow and demanding on the expressions
en_quotes.author: Kriti Sanon

en_quotes.quote: Everybody who is incapable of learning has taken to teaching
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Some books leave us free and some books make us free
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: No man ever prayed heartily without learning something
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Gardening is learning, learning, learning. That's the fun of them. You're always learning
en_quotes.author: Helen Mirren

en_quotes.quote: Every opportunity I got, I took it as a learning experience
en_quotes.author: Satya Nadella

en_quotes.quote: In my life, I have made the occasional catastrophic choice, and it's just a case of moving on and learning from it
en_quotes.author: James Nesbitt

en_quotes.quote: I would fain grow old learning many things
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: Learning starts with failure; the first failure is the beginning of education
en_quotes.author: John Hersey

en_quotes.quote: Anytime you ride against the best in the world, it becomes a learning process
en_quotes.author: Bonnie Blair

en_quotes.quote: Only by learning to live in harmony with your contradictions can you keep it all afloat
en_quotes.author: Audre Lorde

en_quotes.quote: I am very open to learning. I am like a sponge: I'd like to soak up in new things, new skills
en_quotes.author: Catriona Gray

en_quotes.quote: One of the greatest and simplest tools for learning more and growing is doing more
en_quotes.author: Washington Irving

en_quotes.quote: Once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit
en_quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

en_quotes.quote: Never stop learning; knowledge doubles every fourteen months
en_quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

en_quotes.quote: Cars' was about Lightning McQueen learning to slow down and to enjoy life. The journey is the reward
en_quotes.author: John Lasseter

en_quotes.quote: Learning to shoot firearms to me is a little like driving stick - it seems like a decent skill to have
en_quotes.author: Sarah Wayne Callies

en_quotes.quote: I enjoy the element of pushing yourself, learning something new, whether it's a dance step, a scene, an emotion
en_quotes.author: Kenny Wormald

en_quotes.quote: You aren't learning anything when you're talking
en_quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Acting is a career where you keep learning with every film you do
en_quotes.author: Ileana D'Cruz

en_quotes.quote: Education is the process in which we discover that learning adds quality to our lives. Learning must be experienced
en_quotes.author: William Glasser

en_quotes.quote: The fun thing about Snapchat is really the surprise and the joy that comes from learning how to use it
en_quotes.author: Evan Spiegel

en_quotes.quote: Your happiness is at the intersection of your passions and learning from great people
en_quotes.author: Scott Weiss

en_quotes.quote: A man of great memory without learning hath a rock and a spindle and no staff to spin
en_quotes.author: George Herbert

en_quotes.quote: The learning process is something you can incite, literally incite, like a riot
en_quotes.author: Audre Lorde

en_quotes.quote: Learning something new is fun
en_quotes.author: Alex Trebek

en_quotes.quote: The top experts in the world are ardent students. The day you stop learning, you're definitely not an expert
en_quotes.author: Brendon Burchard

en_quotes.quote: In this life, I've learned to be patient. And I'm still learning... Even now, I wish things would go quicker
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Clementine

en_quotes.quote: I'm constantly learning with each new job, especially about people, which is important for playing characters
en_quotes.author: Jodie Comer

en_quotes.quote: There's no learning without trying lots of ideas and failing lots of times
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Ive

en_quotes.quote: And I believe that the best learning process of any kind of craft is just to look at the work of others
en_quotes.author: Wole Soyinka

en_quotes.quote: I don't love studying. I hate studying. I like learning. Learning is beautiful
en_quotes.author: Natalie Portman

en_quotes.quote: I am learning the importance of living in the moment
en_quotes.author: Sushant Singh Rajput

en_quotes.quote: Learning happens in the minds and souls, not in the databases of multiple-choice tests
en_quotes.author: Ken Robinson

en_quotes.quote: What we want is more learning in schools and less activism in schools
en_quotes.author: Scott Morrison

en_quotes.quote: If you desire ease, forsake learning
en_quotes.author: Nagarjuna

en_quotes.quote: And I like asking questions, to keep learning; people with big egos might not want to look unsure
en_quotes.author: Heston Blumenthal

en_quotes.quote: I'm learning English at the moment. I can say 'Big Ben', 'Hello Rodney', 'Tower Bridge' and 'Loo'
en_quotes.author: Cher

en_quotes.quote: Learning is not compulsory... neither is survival
en_quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

en_quotes.quote: If I am through learning, I am through
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: Whoso neglects learning in his youth, loses the past and is dead for the future
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: The fundament upon which all our knowledge and learning rests is the inexplicable
en_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

en_quotes.quote: Learning to live for others isn't something that just comes naturally to anybody. You have to train yourself to do it
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: The trick in life is learning how to deal with it
en_quotes.author: Helen Mirren

en_quotes.quote: We are learning, too, that the love of beauty is one of Nature's greatest healers
en_quotes.author: Ellsworth Huntington

en_quotes.quote: I'm always writing and learning. It's about growth. So I'm growing as a musician, as a guitarist
en_quotes.author: D'Angelo

en_quotes.quote: I really love learning and working long hours
en_quotes.author: Bae Doona

en_quotes.quote: You made a lot of mistakes, and you wrote a lot of crap. But it was all part of the learning process
en_quotes.author: Cynthia Weil

en_quotes.quote: Every industrial revolution brings along a learning revolution
en_quotes.author: Alexander De Croo

en_quotes.quote: I think you're working and learning until you die
en_quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

en_quotes.quote: The one thing that I keep learning over and over again is that I don't know nothing. I mean, that's my life lesson
en_quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Learning to make films is very easy. Learning what to make films about is very hard
en_quotes.author: George Lucas

en_quotes.quote: I am learning aerobics and gymnastics, so I would love to do an action film
en_quotes.author: Disha Patani

en_quotes.quote: I grow old learning something new every day
en_quotes.author: Solon

en_quotes.quote: I'm still learning to love myself
en_quotes.author: Lauren Alaina

en_quotes.quote: The 200 m. is not my best event, and it's something I am learning
en_quotes.author: Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce

en_quotes.quote: Kindness has converted more sinners than zeal, eloquence, or learning
en_quotes.author: Frederick William Faber

en_quotes.quote: Some people are so busy learning the tricks of the trade that they never learn the trade
en_quotes.author: Vernon Law

en_quotes.quote: For me, becoming a man had a lot to do with learning communication, and I learned about that by acting
en_quotes.author: Adam Driver

en_quotes.quote: I think we need to recognize that learning is a lifelong goal, a lifelong experience
en_quotes.author: Adrian Grenier

en_quotes.quote: I think everything you do in life is a learning experience
en_quotes.author: Emeraude Toubia

en_quotes.quote: I take away something from every role. I'm still learning and that's what life is about
en_quotes.author: Cary Elwes

en_quotes.quote: Deliverance is about what I went through the first time. And I chalk it up as a learning experience
en_quotes.author: Bubba Sparxxx

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is exploding, so you need to commit yourself to a plan for lifelong learning
en_quotes.author: Don Tapscott

en_quotes.quote: My philosophy is my learning process. Until you die, you must evolve and improve
en_quotes.author: Miyavi

en_quotes.quote: It's very joyful to be in a productive, creative mood, but I find a lot of joy in learning and being told stories
en_quotes.author: Evelyne Brochu

en_quotes.quote: There's always a learning curve, where you've got to learn what your subject is all about
en_quotes.author: Brad Gilbert

en_quotes.quote: I'm learning to be braver with colorful clothes, even if they're a little wild
en_quotes.author: Yuliya Snigir

en_quotes.quote: Defense is a definite part of the game, and a great part of defense is learning to play it without fouling
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: Learning is finding out what you already know
en_quotes.author: Richard Bach

en_quotes.quote: The things that have been most valuable to me I did not learn in school
en_quotes.author: Will Smith

en_quotes.quote: I was so enthralled watching 'Guys and Dolls' and learning about the Rat Pack
en_quotes.author: Brendon Urie

en_quotes.quote: Learning how to rap actually improved my English, because it forced me to talk fast, and I used to suck at that
en_quotes.author: Rich Brian

en_quotes.quote: It's not about the failure, it's about learning from the failures. Failure itself cannot be celebrated
en_quotes.author: Satya Nadella

en_quotes.quote: I'm a firm believer in learning by heart
en_quotes.author: Seamus Heaney

en_quotes.quote: The mind ought sometimes to be diverted that it may return to better thinking
en_quotes.author: Phaedrus

en_quotes.quote: I'm still learning, you know. At 80, I feel there is a lot I don't know
en_quotes.author: Lena Horne

en_quotes.quote: I still feel like I'm learning a lot and have a lot to learn and improve on
en_quotes.author: Anderson Cooper

en_quotes.quote: I'm always learning. I have to
en_quotes.author: Neymar

en_quotes.quote: I like a challenge. I like learning new skills because I didn't learn much at school
en_quotes.author: Bernard Sumner

en_quotes.quote: Schools should be places of learning and joy, not testing and agita
en_quotes.author: Randi Weingarten

en_quotes.quote: I love talking about women because they are a constant study and you're always learning
en_quotes.author: Mario Lopez

en_quotes.quote: And later I thought, I can't think how anyone can become a director without learning the craft of cinematography
en_quotes.author: Nicolas Roeg

en_quotes.quote: Learning what you don't want is how you know what you do want
en_quotes.author: Robin Wright

en_quotes.quote: Only the other world has substance and reality; only good deeds and holy learning have tangible worth
en_quotes.author: Abraham Cahan

en_quotes.quote: I love nature and enjoy learning new skills
en_quotes.author: Leona Lewis

en_quotes.quote: My entire learning process is slow, because I have no visual memory
en_quotes.author: Georg Solti

en_quotes.quote: When you stop learning, stop listening, stop looking and asking questions, always new questions, then it is time to die
en_quotes.author: Lillian Smith

en_quotes.quote: The learning process continues until the day you die
en_quotes.author: Kirk Douglas

en_quotes.quote: No matter what, you've got to always follow your passion in life and always keep learning
en_quotes.author: Harold Hamm

en_quotes.quote: When I started learning the cello, I fell in love with the instrument because it seemed like a voice - my voice
en_quotes.author: Mstislav Rostropovich

en_quotes.quote: Being a part of the action is just incredible. I loved doing stunt stuff. I loved learning to ride
en_quotes.author: Anna Popplewell

en_quotes.quote: I was learning the craft; I didn't study writing in school. Rejection was my motivation, and failure is what taught me
en_quotes.author: Pierce Brown

en_quotes.quote: Let ignorance talk as it will, learning has its value
en_quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

en_quotes.quote: I am forever learning and changing
en_quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

en_quotes.quote: Learning, n. The kind of ignorance distinguishing the studious
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: When I was 12 years old, I got interested in learning English
en_quotes.author: Jack Ma

en_quotes.quote: Learning how to operate a soul figures to take time
en_quotes.author: Timothy Leary

en_quotes.quote: Some are so very studious of learning what was done by the ancients that they know not how to live with the moderns
en_quotes.author: William Penn

en_quotes.quote: The knack of flying is learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss
en_quotes.author: Douglas Adams

en_quotes.quote: My parents emphasized experiential learning - in my family, being adventurous was a sign of maturity
en_quotes.author: Ali Wong

en_quotes.quote: When I think about my career, my successes are built on learning from failures
en_quotes.author: Satya Nadella

en_quotes.quote: Being a geek is all about learning the inventories of things
en_quotes.author: Adam Savage

en_quotes.quote: This life is a process of learning
en_quotes.author: Lauryn Hill

en_quotes.quote: I like learning. I've been studying Japanese for years now, but it's really hard
en_quotes.author: RM

en_quotes.quote: Life is about learning; when you stop learning, you die
en_quotes.author: Tom Clancy

en_quotes.quote: Books have led some to learning and others to madness
en_quotes.author: Petrarch

en_quotes.quote: A tough lesson in life that one has to learn is that not everybody wishes you well
en_quotes.author: Dan Rather

en_quotes.quote: Just because you have a learning difficulty or difference doesn't mean you aren't smart
en_quotes.author: Gavin Newsom

en_quotes.quote: Learning to read and write changes lives; it means jobs, money, health, and dreams fulfilled
en_quotes.author: Queen Rania of Jordan

en_quotes.quote: There's a lot that machine learning can't do that humans can do very, very well
en_quotes.author: Diane Greene

en_quotes.quote: He that knew all that learning ever writ, Knew only this - that he knew nothing yet
en_quotes.author: Aphra Behn

en_quotes.quote: As I'd go out learning to surf, I'd feel the power of waves coming over my body. It's like you're with God
en_quotes.author: Dick Dale

en_quotes.quote: For me, art is about learning and about living with people. It's alive
en_quotes.author: Miuccia Prada

en_quotes.quote: Perfecting oneself is as much unlearning as it is learning
en_quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

en_quotes.quote: Everybody's a work in progress. I'm a work in progress. I mean, I've never arrived... I'm still learning all the time
en_quotes.author: Renee Fleming

en_quotes.quote: I want to see myself as a student. Keep learning, keep improving, keep your eyes and ears open
en_quotes.author: Dirk Nowitzki

en_quotes.quote: I've learned my lessons, but I'm also still learning them
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Clementine

en_quotes.quote: I think the cardinal rule of learning to write is learning to read first. I learned to write by learning to read
en_quotes.author: Siddhartha Mukherjee

en_quotes.quote: Playing for the Kansas City Monarchs was like my school, my learning, my world. It was my whole life
en_quotes.author: Ernie Banks

en_quotes.quote: From the very beginning, Europe has been not only a success story but also a story of success achieved by learning
en_quotes.author: Jean-Claude Juncker

en_quotes.quote: I was working with Jay Z while I was still learning how to be who I was about to become
en_quotes.author: Travis Scott

en_quotes.quote: Not to unlearn what you have learned is the most necessary kind of learning
en_quotes.author: Antisthenes

en_quotes.quote: You never finish learning
en_quotes.author: Hubert de Givenchy

en_quotes.quote: My earliest memory is learning to read 'Muffin the Mule' when I was about three
en_quotes.author: Mark E. Smith

en_quotes.quote: I do think observing is important in learning
en_quotes.author: Roger Deakins

en_quotes.quote: Washington is agonizingly slow at learning from its mistakes. Especially in the Middle East
en_quotes.author: Chris Murphy

en_quotes.quote: There is no royal road to learning; no short cut to the acquirement of any art
en_quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

en_quotes.quote: Teaching is the royal road to learning
en_quotes.author: Jessamyn West

en_quotes.quote: There's nothing that can replace learning on the field
en_quotes.author: Brock Osweiler

en_quotes.quote: Your girl gets a lot of anxiety. It's OK. It's a learning process
en_quotes.author: Marsai Martin

en_quotes.quote: I'm always learning and trying new things. When you stop learning, you start dying
en_quotes.author: Ellen Burstyn

en_quotes.quote: You should put time into learning your craft. It seems like people want success so quickly, way before they're ready
en_quotes.author: Lucinda Williams

en_quotes.quote: I think that no matter how old you get, you are always learning about yourself
en_quotes.author: Joey Jordison

en_quotes.quote: The best way of learning to be an independent sovereign state is to be an independent sovereign state
en_quotes.author: Kwame Nkrumah

en_quotes.quote: There's no mystery to it. Nothing more complicated than learning lines and putting on a costume
en_quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

en_quotes.quote: Learning is not limited to the classroom, and Minnesota shouldn't limit its education resources there, either
en_quotes.author: Ilhan Omar

en_quotes.quote: I'm kind of still learning my voice and learning my style
en_quotes.author: Shawn Mendes

en_quotes.quote: I like learning more about people; I like to talk to people
en_quotes.author: Jurgen Klopp

en_quotes.quote: You can be self-empowered and still learning about how you think about things daily
en_quotes.author: Tori Amos

en_quotes.quote: When I was learning to drive, I thought the big milestones were changing gear, changing lane, and three-point-turns
en_quotes.author: Victoria Coren Mitchell

en_quotes.quote: The trouble with learning from experience is that you never graduate
en_quotes.author: Doug Larson

en_quotes.quote: The delights of self-discovery are always available
en_quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

en_quotes.quote: No, I'm no enemy to learning; it hurts not me
en_quotes.author: William Congreve

en_quotes.quote: I would like to see a mandate for social and emotional learning absolutely mandated in every state
en_quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

en_quotes.quote: Learning carries within itself certain dangers because out of necessity one has to learn from one's enemies
en_quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

en_quotes.quote: Learning to read music in Braille and play by ear helped me develop a damn good memory
en_quotes.author: Ray Charles

en_quotes.quote: I've had a tough time learning how to act like a congressman. Today I accidentally spent some of my own money
en_quotes.author: Joseph P. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Learn all you can learn. Never stop learning
en_quotes.author: Gza

en_quotes.quote: Learning about and from your customers isn't always easy and requires a commitment to continual observation
en_quotes.author: John Rampton

en_quotes.quote: It has been said that 80% of what people learn is visual
en_quotes.author: Allen Klein

en_quotes.quote: College gives people learning and also takes away future opportunities by loading the next generation down with debt
en_quotes.author: Peter Thiel

en_quotes.quote: It's my dream to make learning as addictive as a video game
en_quotes.author: Sebastian Thrun

en_quotes.quote: My learning process is by eye alone; it's not at all scientific
en_quotes.author: Miuccia Prada

en_quotes.quote: The Seinfeld motto: No learning, no hugging
en_quotes.author: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

en_quotes.quote: Acknowledging mistakes and learning from them are the first steps
en_quotes.author: Travis Kalanick

en_quotes.quote: Learning is a tunnel experience that makes us think more broadly
en_quotes.author: Anna Deavere Smith

en_quotes.quote: That is what learning is. You suddenly understand something you've understood all your life, but in a new way
en_quotes.author: Doris Lessing

en_quotes.quote: Learn as much by writing as by reading
en_quotes.author: John Dalberg-Acton

en_quotes.quote: It's a funny thing. You sort of never figure it out with acting. You're always learning
en_quotes.author: Paul Dano

en_quotes.quote: It's not the teaching, it's the learning
en_quotes.author: Sly Stone

en_quotes.quote: When you are constantly around other professionals, you end up learning and growing
en_quotes.author: Krystle D'Souza

en_quotes.quote: You discover yourself through the research of your work
en_quotes.author: Carine Roitfeld

en_quotes.quote: I'm still learning and trying to become a better actor. I still feel insecurity
en_quotes.author: Dave Bautista

en_quotes.quote: There is an extraordinary collaborative spirit when you are learning and growing
en_quotes.author: Robbie Robertson

en_quotes.quote: The more painful it is, tragically, the more you do learn, though, that's the good part
en_quotes.author: Sylvia Browne

en_quotes.quote: If you aren't learning, you are regressing, because more growth comes from failure than from success
en_quotes.author: Shahid Khan

en_quotes.quote: I spent time living in Ethiopia, learning about the cultural importance of coffee and its roots in Ethiopia
en_quotes.author: Rohan Marley

en_quotes.quote: As an artist, you keep learning. You draw out different parts of you
en_quotes.author: Luis Fonsi

en_quotes.quote: Romy and I, we're learning how to share the xx with people who aren't in the xx
en_quotes.author: Oliver Sim

en_quotes.quote: I know what I like when I see it, but no way have I ever become interested in learning about it
en_quotes.author: Timothy Spall

en_quotes.quote: By discovering how our minds work, we can improve our learning power and unlock our true potential
en_quotes.author: Robert Winston

en_quotes.quote: For the past eight years, the right has been better at working the refs. Now the left is learning how to play the game
en_quotes.author: Eric Alterman

en_quotes.quote: I've been doing a lot of learning from mistakes, first and foremost, and building off that
en_quotes.author: William Green

en_quotes.quote: As your journey goes on, you're continuously learning from everyone
en_quotes.author: Callum Turner

en_quotes.quote: What people actually refer to as research nowadays is really just Googling
en_quotes.author: Dermot Mulroney
